portfolio.title: FrontEnd & BackEnd Doughnut Detective
portfolio.description: This was my first project that used APi's to get data from the server and display it on the page. I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JQuery to build this project. I also used a third party API to get the data from the server.

portfolio.title: FrontEnd & BackEnd Help Me Out
portfolio.description: This was my 2nd project That used api's SQL and Node.js to build the server. I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JQuery to build this project. I also used a third party API to get the data from the server.
